meanings.definition: a particular day or year when an event happened or will happen
meanings.sent1: My birthday is an important date in my calendar.
meanings.sent2: The date of the concert is next Friday.
meanings.sent3: I forgot the date of our anniversary, and my partner was not happy.
meanings.sent4: The date of the meeting loomed closer and closer.
meanings.sent5: The date of the deadline was etched in my mind.

meanings.definition: a social or romantic appointment or engagement
meanings.sent1: He asked her out on a date to the movies.
meanings.sent2: They went on a date to the fancy restaurant downtown.
meanings.sent3: Their date at the amusement park was filled with laughter and joy.
meanings.sent4: The date under the stars was like a scene from a movie.
meanings.sent5: The date by the beach was a perfect moment frozen in time.

meanings.definition: the sweet, edible fruit of the date palm
meanings.sent1: I love snacking on dates for a healthy treat.
meanings.sent2: The market had fresh dates on sale.
meanings.sent3: The date in the dessert added a delightful sweetness to the dish.
meanings.sent4: The date in the smoothie gave it a unique flavor.
meanings.sent5: The date in the salad provided a burst of natural sweetness.
